alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 9:47PM EST until January 09 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 3 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch, and ice accretion around one tenth of an inch expected. Localized accretions up to a quarter inch possible in Cheshire County. * WHERE...Cheshire, Merrimack, Western and Central Hillsborough and Sullivan Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 3 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow or sleet Sunday morning will quickly begin mixing with or change over to light freezing rain. This will make for slick driving conditions through much of the day until temperatures warm to above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
